item.title: Terms of engagement template for freelancers
item.description: Most people who have worked as freelancers for a while will have a story about a client who never paid. Often freelancers just do not have the time to think about getting a lawyer or writing a contract. Indeed the costs of getting a lawyer involved usually outweigh the risks for most freelancer engagements. However many times, all the freelancer needs is that the client understands how they roll: the terms of how they engage.
